text: If you're going through hell, keep going.
author: Winston Churchill

text: No feeling is final.
author: Rainer Maria Rilke

text: You are braver than you believe, stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think.
author: A.A. Milne

text: The only way out is through.
author: Robert Frost

text: There is a crack in everything. That's how the light gets in.
author: Leonard Cohen

text: This too shall pass.
author: Persian proverb

text: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

text: You don't have to control your thoughts. You just have to stop letting them control you.
author: Dan Millman

text: Courage doesn't always roar. Sometimes courage is the quiet voice at the end of the day saying 'I will try again tomorrow.'
author: Mary Anne Radmacher

text: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.
author: Albert Einstein

text: You are not a drop in the ocean. You are the entire ocean in a drop.
author: Rumi

text: Stars can't shine without darkness.
author: Unknown

text: Fall seven times, stand up eight.
author: Japanese proverb

text: Out of difficulties grow miracles.
author: Jean de La Bruy√®re

text: It always seems impossible until it's done.
author: Nelson Mandela

text: Be kind. For everyone you meet is fighting a hard battle.
author: Ian Maclaren

text: You yourself, as much as anybody in the entire universe, deserve your love and affection.
author: Buddha

text: The dark is not an end, but a beginning.
author: Unknown

text: Sometimes the smallest step in the right direction ends up being the biggest step of your life.
author: Naeem Callaway

text: Turn your wounds into wisdom.
author: Oprah Winfrey

text: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
author: Peter Drucker

text: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
author: Wayne Gretzky

text: Hope is being able to see that there is light despite all of the darkness.
author: Desmond Tutu

text: It is never too late to be what you might have been.
author: George Eliot

text: Just keep swimming.
author: Dory (Finding Nemo)
